subject: Boxing
Jews and Judaism
lead_paragraph: Scotty Ballan’s bar mitzvah reception at the stadium will begin at 6 on Saturday, and Yuri Foreman, the super welterweight champion and a rabbinical student, will step into the ring to defend his title at about 11:30.
snippet: Scotty Ballan’s bar mitzvah reception at the stadium will begin at 6 on Saturday, and Yuri Foreman, the super welterweight champion and a rabbinical student, will step into the ring to defend his title at about 11:30.
